shortdesc.ph: Brightness level of locally captured video quality.
Brightness level of the locally captured video.
Brightness level of locally captured video quality.
Brightness level of locally captured video quality.

plentry.pd: -1: The SDK did not detect the brightness level of the locally captured video quality. Please wait a few seconds and get the brightness level from the next callback via captureBrightnessLevel.
0: The brightness of the locally captured video quality is normal.
1: The brightness of the locally captured video quality is bright.
2: The brightness of the locally captured video quality is dark.
-1: SDK did not detect the brightness level of the locally captured video. Please wait a few seconds and get the brightness level from the next captureBrightnessLevel callback.
0: Brightness level of the locally captured video is normal.
1: Brightness level of the locally captured video is bright.
2: Brightness level of the locally captured video is dark.
-1: SDK did not detect the brightness level of the locally captured video. Please wait a few seconds and get the brightness level from the next captureBrightnessLevel callback.
0: Brightness of the locally captured video is normal.
1: Brightness of the locally captured video is too bright.
2: Brightness of the locally captured video is too dark.
-1: SDK has not detected the brightness level of the locally captured video. Please wait a few seconds and get the brightness level from the next captureBrightnessLevel callback.
0: Normal brightness level of locally captured video.
1: Locally captured video is too bright.
2: Locally captured video is too dark.
